name: Pool Dice
description:
Q-T1p and Vic2ria are playing Pool Dice!

The idea is simple: The pool balls have dice dots, and the outcome of the white ball's roll will affect the other player!

Rules:
- The game is controlled entirely using the mouse
- Q-T1p and Vic2ria alternate turns
- Get the balls that belong to you in the holes (you can see which ones belong to you below your name)
- If you hit the black ball (the 8-ball) in one of the holes, you lose, unless you've putted all your other balls first (in which case, you win)
- Putting the white ball ends your turn, allows the other player to place the white ball in a spot of their choosing, and then begin their turn
- The dice outcome of the white ball chooses an effect

Effects:
1: Flashlight - You can only see the area near your ball.
2: Reposition - The player who just shot the white ball gets to reposition it. (Tip: Put the other player in a tough spot! Their turn will begin right after.)
3: Wonky aim - When shooting the ball, you won't be going exactly where you were aiming!
4: Spin - The ball gets spun wildly!
5: Colorblind - You can't differentiate the balls!
6: Weak shot - You can't shoot the ball as hard as normal!

Tip: You can press escape to go back to the menu.
